name: Dark Warwick
description: Dark theme for University of Warwick pages
additional_info: I recommend installing via UserCSS, as this allows for automatic updates. Install from my GitHub here. If you find any issues, please report them here and I'll look into them. Far from complete, if I find an issue, I'll fix it, but I can only fix pages I have access to. Tested mainly on DCS pages, but also themes Tabula and websignon. Filters should work (mostly) on any department's pages, but there are a lot of conflicting styles, which are very difficult to all take account for. Good luck if you try modifying this, most of this is trial and error based. CHANGELOG - Full websignon styling - Various fixes for both main site and Tabula - Remove background and text header inversion filters - use brightness instead
